title: Israeli chicken schnitzel with red cabbage and apple coleslaw
description: This Middle-Eastern take on an Austrian classic is great for feeding a crowd.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz fine dried breadcrumbs or matzo meal
4 large chicken breasts, butterflied and flattened
squeeze lemon juice or a few drops vinegar
2 crisp eating apples, peeled, cored and finely chopped
